nice, A classic fun game I hope it still works on windows 7, been getting bored after the jokes that were "dungeons" and "sims medieval"
Thanks Dj
i have not tested it on windows 7 but i think it should work fine please leave a comment for other users of windows 7 if it works or not :)

can confirm, works fine on my win7 pro 64. just unpacked too C:, videos and music working. "wouldnt want to play this without them" :)
also patch 1.1 seems too be already installed.
Thanks again.
Fuck, this game is fun, Great
